Title: Treaty Banning Nuclear Weapon Tests in the Atmosphere, in Outer Space and  Under Water (The Limited Test Ban Treaty)
Treaty on Principles Governing the Activities of States in the Exploration and Use of Outer Space, including the Moon and Other Celestial Bodies (The Outer Space Treaty)
Treaty on the Non-Proliferation of Nuclear Weapons (Nuclear Non-proliferation Treaty)
Treaty on the Prohibition of the Emplacement of Nuclear Weapons and other Weapons of Mass Destruction on the Seabed and the Ocean Floor and in the Subsoil Thereof  (SEABED Treaty)
Convention on the Prohibition of the Development, Production and Stockpiling of Bacteriological (Biological) and Toxin Weapons and on their Destruction  (The Biological Weapons Convention)
Convention on the Prohibition of Military or any Other Hostile Use of Environmental Modification Techniques (ENMOD)
Convention on Certain Conventional Weapons Amended Protocol II
Treaty on Open Skies
First_proposer: NATO (US proposed negotiations; 16 NATO foreign ministers met to put together joint NATO position)

Title: Convention on the Prohibition of the Development, Production, Stockpiling and Use of Chemical Weapons and on their Destruction (Chemical Weapons Convention - CWC)
First_proposer: USSR w/ Bulgaria, Czechoslovakia, Hungary, Mongolia, Poland, Romania

Title: International Convention for the Suppression of Terrorist Bombings
First_proposer: France/G7 (France introduces draft on behalf of the G-7 and Russian Federation)

Title: Treaty on Conventional Armed Forces in Europe (CFE Treaty)
Concluding Act of the Negotiations on Personnel Strength of Conventional Armed Forces in Europe (CFE 1A)
Agreement on Adaptation of the Treaty on Conventional Armed Forces in Europe
Convention on Offenses and Certain Other Acts Committed on Board Aircraft (Tokyo Convention)
Convention on the Physical Protection of Nuclear Material (Nuclear Materials Convention)
International Convention for the Suppression of the Financing of Terrorism
Convention on the Suppression of Acts of Nuclear Terrorism
